INSERT INTO command(id, quantity, status, account_id) VALUES (UUID(), 10, 'CREATED', (SELECT id FROM account WHERE username = 'Leo'));
INSERT INTO command_attribute_options (command_id, attribute_option_id) VALUES ((SELECT id FROM command JOIN account ON (account.id = command.account_id) WHERE account.name = 'Leo' AND command.quantity = 10), (SELECT ao.id FROM attribute_option AS ao JOIN attribute AS a on (ao.attribute_id = a.id) WHERE a.name = 'Couleur' AND ao.value = '#FF0000'))
